item.title: Pink SweatS - 17
item.description:
I would need
a million words
If I tried
to define
All the things
you mean to me yeah
For you I’d die
a thousand lives
Special kind
of energy
‘Cause love is born
when hearts collide
Every time
you touch me
You remind me
that I’m still alive
So promise
you’ll never change
And I’ll always
be the same
We’ll be dancing
the same groove
When we are 92
the same as 17
And I’ll never lie
to you
Just don’t you hold
back on me
I wanna love you
as strong
When we are 92
the same as 17
I don’t really know
what’s right
But I can never call
you wrong
I just wanna dance
with you
Floatin’ over
marble floors
You’re something
like an angel
You do something
to my mind
I can see
a thousand years
When I’m lookin’
in your eyes
So promise
you’ll never change
And I’ll always
be the same
We’ll be dancing
the same groove
When we are 92
the same as 17
And I’ll never lie
to you
Just don’t you hold
back on me
I wanna love you
as strong
When we are 92
the same as 17
Just promise
you’ll never change
And I’ll always
be the same
We’ll be dancing
the same groove
When we are 92
the same as 17
And I’ll never lie
to you
Just don’t you hold
back on me
I wanna love you
as strong
When we are 92
the same as 17
